item.title: Firefox Flatpak hits Flathub stable
item.description: Distro wars time: I’m a Fedora Silverblue user. I use it for both the ease of administration as well as the security benefits a completely containerized workflow provides. One common issue folks trying to make the switch run into is packages being wholly unavailable - this can be resolved in three ways. Fedora Toolbox to create a Fedora container and dnf install tools. Flatpak to install graphical tools to be used on the desktop-side of the OS.
